name: James T. BECK, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent

parties: James T. BECK, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of December 2002, the Application for Stay is denied. The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Timothy P. Wile, Harrisburg, for Bureau of Driver Licensing.
casebody.head_matter:
812 A.2d 553
James T. BECK, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 18, 2002.
James T. Beck, pro se.
Timothy P. Wile, Harrisburg, for Bureau of Driver Licensing.
